title: ls or copy file error for Onedrive Business(using webdav sharepoint)
body:
@hensur , @ncw 

this issue related to:
onedrive: Onedrive Business Support for organizations in an unamanged state (mostly universities) #1975  [#1975](https://github.com/ncw/rclone/issues/1975)

This is a problem to ls or copy file in webdav (onedrive sharepoint) , for example:
When ls, copy or sync from a source directory, it work fine.
rclone ls od1:song
rclone copy od1:song/  ./mylocal

But when ls or copy from a source file,, it has error:
rclone  ls od1:song/my.mp3
rclone copy od1:song/my.mp3  ./mylocal
ERROR : : error reading source directory: directory not found

Using rclone --dump headers --log-level DEBUG ls od1:song/my.mp3 to debug:
DEBUG : HTTP REQUEST (req 0xc4203ea300)
DEBUG : PROPFIND /personal/xxx_xxx_edu/Documents/song/my.mp3 HTTP/1.1
Host: xxx-my.sharepoint.com
DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
DEBUG : HTTP RESPONSE (req 0xc4203ea300)
DEBUG : HTTP/1.1 404 NOT FOUND
 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
ERROR : : error listing: directory not found
Failed to ls: directory not found

Using rclone --dump headers --log-level DEBUG ls od1:song/  to debug:
DEBUG : HTTP REQUEST (req 0xc420310e00)
DEBUG : PROPFIND /personal/xxx_xxx_edu/Documents/song/  HTTP/1.1
DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
DEBUG : HTTP RESPONSE (req 0xc420310e00)
DEBUG : HTTP/1.1 207 MULTI-STATUS
DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
  4750661 my.mp3
  3898990 test.mp3
